original_title: Sesame Street: Elmo's Rainbow and Other Springtime Stories
overview: What's at the bottom of Elmo's rainbow? A DVD full of your favorite Sesame Street friends! There is a rainbow on Sesame Street, and Elmo can't wait to show Rosita, but when they return, the rainbow has disappeared! Their friends try to re-create a rainbow with artwork, multi-colored monsters, magic, and a fun science experiment, but it's just not the same. Will Rosita ever see a real rainbow? Learn more about rainbows, seasons, and bumblebees with you Sesame Street friends, plus see the classic Cookie Bunny bonus video!
title: Sesame Street: Elmo's Rainbow and Other Springtime Stories
